title: I Push
subtle: Concept (fiction), 32 words, Level A (Grade K), Lexile BR130L
description: What happens when you push something? In I Push, students read about various things that can be pushed and see what happens as a result. Detailed illustrations and repetitive text support early emergent readers. The story can also be used to teach students how to connect to prior knowledge and determine cause-and-effect relationships.
reviewWords: baby, bike, button, cart, door, swing
comprehension: Cause and Effect                : Identify cause-and-effect relationships
awareness: Initial and Final Sounds : Discriminate initial consonant /p/ sound
grammar: Complete Sentences                : Recognize and use complete sentences
wordWork: High-Frequency Words : Identify and use the high-frequency word the
